sentences.en: A few years later , however, the Court relaxed this seemingly stringent requirement.
sentences.cn: 但几年以后, 最高法院放宽了这项看起来很苛刻的要求.

sentences.en: A seemingly endless line of trucks waits in vain to load up.
sentences.cn: 一眼望不到头的一长列卡车眼巴巴地等着装货。

sentences.en: a seemingly unending supply of money
sentences.cn: 似乎源源不断的资金供应

sentences.en: Any seemingly viable proposition will be tested by market research.
sentences.cn: 任何表面上可行的建议都要通过市场研究予以检验.

sentences.en: Even seemingly innocuous words are offensive in certain contexts.
sentences.cn: 甚至看似毫无恶意的言辞在某些语境下都会引起冒犯。

sentences.en: He has moved to Spain, seemingly to enjoy a slower style of life.
sentences.cn: 他已经移居西班牙，似乎是想过一种更为悠闲的生活。

sentences.en: Her fellow members marveled at her seemingly infinite energy.
sentences.cn: 她的同事们对她似乎无穷的精力大为惊叹。

sentences.en: His face was covered in red blotches, seemingly a nasty case of acne.
sentences.cn: 他满脸红斑，像是起了很严重的粉刺。

sentences.en: Seemingly inconsequential details can sometimes contain significant clues.
sentences.cn: 貌似无足轻重的细节有时可能隐含着重大的线索。
似乎互不相关的零星信息

sentences.en: She was rich, beautiful and seemingly ageless.
sentences.cn: 她富有而美丽，永远显得那么年轻。

sentences.en: Suddenly all of the bizarre and seemingly isolated examples took on a meaningful focus.
sentences.cn: 突然之间，所有那些怪异且看上去孤立的例子都具有了意义。

sentences.en: The Bundesbank's seemingly impregnable position has begun to weaken.
sentences.cn: 德意志联邦银行看似不可撼动的地位开始削弱了。

sentences.en: There is seemingly nothing we can do to stop the plans going ahead.
sentences.cn: 看样子我们无法阻止这些计划的实施。

sentences.en: They were decked out in tracksuits, seemingly to dissimulate their true function.
sentences.cn: 他们都穿着田径服，似乎想掩饰他们的真实职能。

sentences.en: We often read in novels how a seemingly respectable person or family has some terrible secret which has been concealed from strangers for years.
sentences.cn: 表面上道貌岸然的人或有声望的家庭,却有着骇人听闻,多年不让人知道的秘密,这样的事情我们经常在小说里读到.

trans.tran_cn: 看来似乎，表面上看来，貌似
trans.tran_en: appearing to have a particular quality, when this may or may not be true
